name: Artist and Clothing Shop
description:
Artist and Clothing Shop is a unique combination of strategy and simulation game with some economic elements. Do your best to run a clothing store while making enough money to keep your shop open and pursue your hobby of painting. Manage every aspect of your shop and use your skills and make different types of clothes to make your shop best in the town!!

  • Complete control over YOUR shop! Design your very own clothes and set their price.
  • Buy clothes from different brands
  • A detailed management mode to neatly organise your empire. Purchase new tables, adjust the business hours, add new furniture to your restaurant, advertise it, propose scrumptious offers to your customers!
  • Buy furniture and equipment
  • Hire staff, each with their own skills
  • Decide every detail of tables to TVs and do whatever it takes to make your customers happy!
